SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.network.tcp.client

Class ClientTCP

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.network.tcp.client.ClientTCP
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client
public class ClientTCP extends Object implements Client
This class represents the client It contains the internal information useful for the client and the actions it can do to interact with the other players and with the server

    Description
    void
    checkServerStatus()
    This method checks the Server Status in order to know if the server's connection is still open If the server has disconnected it handles the disconnection

  • Method Details

    • startClient

      public void startClient() throws IOException
      This method starts the client, it initializes the serverHandler to receive messages It starts two parallel threads, one for the ServerHandler and one to check the ServerStatus
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if there are mistakes during the initializing phase
      IOException

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Message message)
      This method send the message to the server If there are mistakes during the sending process it manages the fact that the server is down
      Parameters:
      message - message to be sent

    • createGame

      public int createGame(String nickname, int numPlayers) throws GameFullException, NicknameInvalidException, NicknameAlreadyInUseException, NumberPlayerWrongException, GameAlreadyCreatedException
      This method sends a message to the server to create a new Game with the specified number of players It waits for the server's answer and manages the exceptions based on the message's type
      Specified by:
      createGame in interface Client
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the Player
      numPlayers - number of Players chosen by the First Player
      Returns:
      1 the creation was ok
      Throws:
      GameFullException - if the Game is full
      NicknameInvalidException - if the chosen nickname is invalid
      NicknameAlreadyInUseException - if the chosen nickname is already used by another player
      NumberPlayerWrongException - if the chosen number is wrong
      GameAlreadyCreatedException - if tha game has been already created

    • connect

      public boolean connect(String nickname) throws GameFullException, NicknameInvalidException, NicknameAlreadyInUseException

      Specified by:
      connect in interface Client
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the Player
      Returns:
      true if the connection was ok
      Throws:
      GameFullException - if the Game is full
      NicknameInvalidException - if the chosen nickname is invalid
      NicknameAlreadyInUseException - if the chosen nickname is already used by another player
